mapper.insert: insert into room(ROOM_NAME, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_COUNT) values(#{roomName}, #{roomPrice}, #{roomCount})
mapper.select: select r.room_name , r.room_count-count(cn.gr_no) as bin from room r left outer join (select ci.room_name, ci.che_no, gr.gr_no, ci.che_in_date, ci.che_out_date from guest_room gr left outer join checkin ci on(gr.che_no = ci.che_no) where ci.che_out_date > to_date(#{cheIn},'YYYY-MM-DD') and ci.che_in_date < to_date(#{cheOut},'YYYY-MM-DD') and ci.pay_no is null order by ci.che_no) cn on(cn.room_name = r.room_name) where r.room_name = #{roomname} group by r.room_name, r.room_count
